items.answer: We accommodate both small custom orders and large-scale mass production requirements, with flexible minimum order quantities tailored to your project needs.
items.question: What are your minimum order quantities?

items.answer: Standard lead times range from 2-6 weeks depending on complexity and volume. Custom projects are evaluated individually to provide precise timelines.
items.question: What are your typical production lead times?

items.answer: We maintain rigorous quality standards with ISO certifications and comprehensive quality control processes for automotive and aerospace components.
items.question: What quality certifications do you maintain?

items.answer: We specialize in brass manufacturing with expertise in precision machining for complex automotive and aerospace component requirements.
items.question: What materials do you specialize in?
